testcase.name: To test client side validations on mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given for url...............................................................passed When user enter username and password.......................................passed And click sign in to open erp home page.....................................passed Then user click fee manager logo............................................passed When user open cheque report date wise......................................passed And verify validation when no entry mode is selected on cheque report date wise.passed And verify validation when no date from is selected on cheque report date wise.passed And select from date as month "July" year "2017" and day "1" on cheque report date wise.passed And verify validation when no date to is selected on cheque report date wise.passed And select to date as month "August" year "2017" and day "1" on cheque report date wise.passed And verify validation when no class is selected on cheque report date wise..passed And verify validation when no cheque bank is selected on cheque report date wise.passed
